website_summaries.verdict: One of the best all- around body sunscreens to buy if you want to avoid the normal white residue left by other sunscreen brands.
pros: Joins excellent sun protection, particularly for hot, cloudless days, and a makeup premier formula
Can wear this sunscreen underneath a layer of makeup
cons: Comes in a smaller bottle compares to general sunscreen brands

customer_reviews.title: Fake product
customer_reviews.text: I fell in love with tatcha sunscreen when I was in New York 2 yrs ago and decided to purchase it online. Big mistake! Made me look like a disco ball. Plus, the packaging is definitely different than the one I got from Sephora
customer_reviews.author: Jarrah

customer_reviews.title: Did a good job
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent sunblock. I do not feel that it was anything spectacular especially for the price. It does have some fragrance that was a mixture of sunscreen and flowers and it was a little off putting this is why I gave it 4 stars. I do not believe I would repurchase just because of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Flora Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great smell and texture, but I've got sunburns
customer_reviews.text: When I first received the product I was so exited, it has so many great reviews and the smell and texture on the skin after apply it is really nice, so I thought it worths the price. I was about to buy it in Sephora but the amazon price was cheaper, so I order it from here, but after a few weeks I'm very dissapointed; I've had sunburns even few minutes after application, now I'm concerned about the fact that could be fake and that would explain the price difference... is this even possible been Tatcha the seller?
customer_reviews.author: St

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: It's the second time I buy this sunscreen, I apply it every day, even under makeup, it is perfect for my 36 year old skin.
customer_reviews.author: Carina Ash

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS PRODUCT!! I have struggled for years to find a sunblock for my sensitive face. With this product, my eyes don't wster and nose doesn't run. I feel like I am putting silk on my face. It goes on smoothly, no white cast and not oily. I am totally protected from the sun with this product. Simply the best!
customer_reviews.author: Dee Conway

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough good things about this product! Feels amazing, light weight and non greasy. I use it as a primer under foundation daily and it feels great all day. I just wish the price wasn’t so high.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fragrance is very pretty and light
customer_reviews.text: It's truly a delightful sunscreen product. Feels very silky and smooth.. Fragrance is very pretty and light. Your makeup just glides on so smooth over it. I love it and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: No white film blends easily into skin without feeling greasy.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this sunscreen but I wear it mix it with my “ Dewy Tatcha” moisturizer on its own it is not as creamy as I like for my “ mature skin” as I am in my fifties so love more moisture but want the added spf! I’m outside daily so love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: my favorite sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: Love this sunscreen primer. Goes on smooth and doesn't feel greasy. Make up goes on nicely afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Break out
customer_reviews.text: Tried twice and broke out twice. But i like that it was matte and sheer.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It’s great under makeup without making you oily!
customer_reviews.author: INGRID LAPPOST

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive and oily skins
customer_reviews.text: I love how light it is on my face. It doesn’t leave that oily shine that most sunblock does it has more of a matte finish and I have very sensitive skin and I use this everyday and it does not cause me to break out. I hate how expensive it is but I haven’t found anything better for my skin. I love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product works
customer_reviews.text: This is the ONLY product I have found to control my extremely oily skin. It does go on thick, but it blends in well.
customer_reviews.author: P. Gaines

customer_reviews.title: Absorbs well and can be used as a primer
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been liking a few of tatcha’s products and I thought this would be nice to use as an spf and top off my moisturizer. the scent smells like other Tatcha products combined with that sunscreen smell. Similar to the silk canvas, this does have a slightly pink-ish/purplish cast when spread over the skin, but for me it does go away (I currently Have light-medium skin with yellow/neutral undertones). It definitely feels like a primer and I wanted to try using it that way as well since I do feel it makes my face slightly matte. Even without makeup, this lasts pretty well and doesn’t leave me feeling totally greasy (I have oily acne prone skin).
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: My face doesnt do well with oily or sticky sunscreens and I also needed something that helped with my pores and breakouts. A friend recommended me this and the finish on it is so silky smooth. My face gets a little dry in the sun as well, so it even helps moisturize my skin. I love this product so much! Would definitely buy again once I use it up.
customer_reviews.author: VKRB

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money as this product is a fantastic 3 in 1 product
customer_reviews.text: I use this EVERY day for sun protection/moisturizer and as a great primer for foundation/powder.
customer_reviews.author: cee

customer_reviews.title: truly silken
customer_reviews.text: Love how easy this sunscreen is to apply but way too $$$
customer_reviews.author: krispy_enterprises

product_meta.title: Tatcha Silken Pore Perfecting Sunscreen SPF 35: Lightweight, Anti-Aging Sunscreen with Matte Finish and UVA/UVB Protection (2 oz)
feature_bullets: A WEIGHTLESS anti-aging sunscreen with broad spectrum SPF 35 that blends effortlessly and invisibly for matte, poreless-looking skin.
PROVIDES BROAD SPECTRUM SPF 35 protection from UVA and UVB rays with pure, skin-loving ingredients.

SILK EXTRACT leaves skin feeling silky-smooth, Japanese wild rose helps tighten the look of pores and smooths skin texture, and loquat leaf extract offers a rich source of antioxidants to protect and calm skin.
PERFECT as a primer for makeup without leaving a chalky finish.

FORMULATED WITHOUT: Parabens, synthetic fragrances, mineral oil, sulfate detergents, phthalates, urea, DEA or TEA. Does not contain aminobenzoic acid, homosalate, oxybenzone or octinoxate. Non-comedogenic. Non-irritating. Non-sensitizing. Dermatologist tested. Cruelty-free.
